title: Leaverbuster
body:
HI, i have a very big problem with leaverbuster, and i dont afk on purpose, my computer crashes, and then i get banned. This is so bogus because it is not my fault, there is nothing i can do about this.
Suggestions
1. If you disconnect- you bacome a bot (this may be too lenient)
2.Make the punishment you cant play for a few days rather than what it is now.
3. Scan the computer that disconected to see what happened or something like that.

Please answer and fix.****

replies.body:
Leaverbuster will treat all leaves equally regardless of intent because it still causes negative experiences for players.  The lower priority queue is a good opportunity for players to resolve any connection issues before joining a game. Suspending them is not entirely helpful in resolving their issues, especially if it's unintentional.  [We have a few guides](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us) available to troubleshoot connection issues, as well as tools to gather logs for our tech team to assist you.

I think having feedback and ideas on Leaverbuster is good to have so they can be improved, and I recommend voicing them at our [Player Behavior Boards](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/player-behavior-moderation).  If you are experiencing any issues that might be causing Leaverbuster, please let me know and I'd be happy to help or you can also reach out to our tech team by[ submitting a ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new)!
